# Gurdwara Dukh Niwaran Sahib

| map_alt               =
| location              = Ludhiana
| district              = Ludhiana
| state                 = Punjab
| country               = India
| architecture_type     = Gurdwara
| architecture_style    = Sikh architecture
}}
Gurdwara Dukh Niwaran Sahib is the largest gurdwara in the city of Ludhiana, Punjab, India. According to Sikh legend, this gurdwara was built by Guru Har Rai in 1641 to remove suffering.
